title: Tubolito X-Tubo City/Tour inner tube can’t be punctured – offers 1 year warranty to back it up
content:
A 1-year puncture proof guarantee for an inner tube? That’s unheard of. But it’s exactly what Tubolito is offering with their latest thermoplastic polyurethane (TPU) wonder tube. Tubolito’s goal with the X-Tubo was simple – create a tube that couldn’t be punctured. On second though, that doesn’t sound so simple… Like other Tubolito products, the […]

The post Tubolito X-Tubo City/Tour inner tube can’t be punctured – offers 1 year warranty to back it up appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
